籤詩版本二:
Segudo riri kubhururuka kubva mukeji, ndinoda kuwana mumwe muviri asi handikwanise
Zvakaoma kubuda kuchamhembe, kumaodzanyemba, kumabvazuva nekumadokero.Iri hexagram rinotya ruvengo zvechokwadi.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi yakafanana negudo rinozvikanda mumvura (keji).
Zvose hazvina maturo uye zvishoma chaizvo.
解曰: Hazviiti (hazviiti) kupinda mumuviri. Kudzokera kumashure (to regress) kureva kugona. Chengetedza musoro wako pasi uye uende zvakananga. Zvose mariri.
籤詩故事一:
◇Qin akakunda uye akatora vatungamiriri vatatu
Duke Mu weQin haana kuteerera zano regurukota rake rekare Jian Gong ndokutumira mauto kunorwisa nyika yeZheng.Akarwa nevanhu veJin muHuo (iri pakati peLuoning County neShaanxian County muHenan Province, China).
Mauto eJin akakwevera mauto eQin mumupata une ngozi.Mugwagwa waive mberi wakavharika.Mauto eJin kumativi ose akakanda moto,sarufa nesaltpeter.Varwi veJin vaiva shure kwavo vakauraya neruzha rukuru.Uto reQin rakatsikana zvikaita kuti vakawanda vakafa.
Vakakundwa uye mauto ese ari matatu akatorwa.
聖意: Kusagadzikana pamba, munhu azvisungirira, kutsvaka mari, nhubu, kutengeserana, kuparadza wanano, kurangwa, kukuvadzwa, kurangwa, ugororo, kuvhiringika kwevanofamba netsoka, kushaya makonye esirika, denda, vanhu vakashaikwa, kutongwa, nhamo, kutama, kurasikirwa nepfuma, hosha yakaipa, achiparadzira makomo namakuva
古人: Qin akakunda uye akatora vatungamiri vatatu
